text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType where concept is-a PRCN

name: ActRelationshipHasPreCondition
title: ActRelationshipHasPre-condition
description: A requirement to be true before a service is performed. The target can be any service in criterion mood. For multiple pre-conditions a conjunction attribute (AND, OR, XOR) is applicable.
